summary: Luciano is a charming fishmonger whose unexpected and sudden obsession with being a contestant on a reality show leads him down a rabbit hole of skewed perceptions and paranoia.
cast: Aniello Arena|Loredana Simioli|Nando Paone|Nello Iorio|Nunzia Schiano|Rosaria D'Urso|Giuseppina Cervizzi|Claudia Gerini|Raffaele Ferrante|Paola Minaccioni|Ciro Petrone|Salvatore Misticone|Vincenzo Riccio|Martina Graziuso|Alessandra Scognamillo|Yohana Allen|Berta Bert√®|Angelica Borghese|Carlo Del Sorbo|Arturo Gambardella
title: Reality
